margot 1.0.43

attach policy-value tests to a subset of outcomes

Source: R/margot_compute_policy_value_helpers.R
margot_add_policy_batch.Rd

this is the pared-back replacement for the earlier, more complex batch helper. it simply iterates over the outcomes you pass in `keep`, calls `margot_add_policy_p()` on each model, and invisibly returns the updated `cf_out` so you can keep piping.

Usage

margot_add_policy_batch(cf_out, keep, depth = 2L, R = 999L, seed = 2025L)

Arguments

cf_out

list. full **margot** result.

keep

character. outcome names to update (without the `model_` prefix).

depth

integer. policy-tree depth. default 2.

R, seed

bootstrap settings for the underlying test (defaults 999 / 2025).

Value

the modified `cf_out` (invisibly).
